returnType: The SESSIONTIMEZONE function returns a time zone offset (in the following format: '[+|-]TZH:TZM') or a time zone region name.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL SESSIONTIMEZONE function returns the current session's time zone as a time zone offset (in the following format: '[+|-]TZH:TZM') or a time zone region name.
sample:
SELECT SESSIONTIMEZONE
FROM dual; +00:00 -07:00 ALTER SESSION SET TIME_ZONE = '-7:0';
